Text: RE booksany must reads in your opinion thanks erik Original Message From Rogers Benjamin Sent Monday January AM To Deadwyler Erik Subject RE books Eric There is a book store called the Brown Book Store located several blocks from here They have several books on trading within this industry that you will want to read You will need to call information to find out where they are Good Luck Ben Original Message From Deadwyler Erik Sent Monday January AM To Rogers Benjamin Subject books Hey Ben Hope you had a great holiday and you guys are staying busy Things down in EIM are looking a little more promising since our current direction is to hold onto some of our assets and potentially take a group of people forward to do some lowcredit tradingIm cautiously optimistic I did want your recommendation on any books for someone interested in learning about power trading Any ideas Thanks Ben Erik
